artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Ebisuya Shōshichi
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
markings: date seal: 寅六 {tora roku} (Tiger 6) | censor seal: 改 {aratame} (inspected) | publisher's seal: {Ebisuya Shōshichi}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Selection of Thriving Modern Six Flowers (Tōsei rokkasen 當盛六花撰)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga} | 廣重筆 {Hiroshige hitsu}
text: Figures by Kunisada, Background flower by Hiroshige.
title: Begonia (The Actors Nakayama Ichizō and Bandō Shuka)
